services_description: Professional services designed to keep your spaces clean, healthy, and pest-free. Experience the difference with our expert team and eco-friendly solutions.
please_select_package: Please select a package before booking.
our_services_description: Discover our comprehensive range of cleaning and pest control services, each designed to meet your specific needs with professional excellence.
hero_title: Dubai’s Trusted Cleaning & Pest Control Experts — Fresh Homes, Healthy Spaces.
hero_subtitle: WE LET YOUR HOME BREATHE SAFETY
feature_pricing_description: Clear upfront pricing with no surprises or additional charges
feature_staff_description: Every Team member is professionally trained and security verified
feature_experience_description: Trusted expertise spanning across borders with proven track record
feature_eco_description: Environmental-friendly cleaning products and safe pest control methods
feature_booking_description: Lightning-fast booking through our form or WhatsApp in just one minute
brightscope_difference_heading: The Bright Scope Difference– Where Clean Meets Comfort
brightscope_difference_paragraph: At Bright Scope, we go beyond cleaning — we bring clarity, comfort, and care into every home and office.
why_choose_us_subtitle: Discover what makes us the trusted choice for thousands of customers across Dubai and beyond
footer_tagline: Your trusted cleaning and pest control partner in Dubai. 15+ years of excellence from Egypt to the UAE, serving thousands of satisfied customers.
footer_copyright: © 2024 Bright Scope Dubai. All rights reserved.

about_page.subtitle: From Egypt to Dubai, we've been transforming spaces and lives for over 15 years. Our journey is built on trust, innovation, and an unwavering commitment to excellence.

mission.missionDescription: To deliver exceptional cleaning and pest control services that exceed expectations while maintaining the highest standards of safety and environmental responsibility.
mission.visionDescription: To become the leading provider of cleaning and pest control services in the MENA region, setting new standards for quality, innovation, and customer care.

journey.subtitle: From humble beginnings in Egypt to becoming a trusted name across borders

0.title: Founded in Egypt
0.desc: Started our journey in Cairo with a vision to revolutionize cleaning services

1.title: Expanding Operations
1.desc: Grew to serve over 50 cities with 100+ professional staff, expanding our footprint across Egypt.

2.title: Digital Innovation
2.desc: Launched our digital platform and introduced eco-friendly solutions to improve service efficiency.

3.title: Dubai Expansion
3.desc: Bringing 15 years of expertise to the UAE market with cutting-edge services and local teams.

people.subtitle: The heart of Bright Scope - our professional, trained, and dedicated team members

item1.title: Background Verified
item1.description: Every team member undergoes thorough background checks

item3.title: Eco-Conscious
item3.description: Committed to sustainable and safe practices

peace.title: Your Peace of Mind is Our Promise
peace.paragraph: When you choose Bright Scope, you're not just getting a service – you're gaining a trusted partner committed to creating cleaner, healthier, and more comfortable spaces for you and your loved ones. From our family to yours, we bring reliability, excellence, and care to every job we do.

contact_page.hintTitle: Your Cleaner, Healthier Space is Just a Call Away
contact_page.hintParagraph: At Bright Scope, we're not just cleaning – we're creating healthier, more comfortable environments for you and your loved ones. Reach out today and let us take care of the rest.
contact_page.getInTouchSubtitle: We're here to help you with any questions or to schedule your next cleaning service. Our friendly team is ready to provide you with exceptional support and personalized solutions.

card.call_description: Speak directly to our Customer Service Team
card.whatsapp_description: Get immediate assistance through our chat
card.email_description: Send us your queries and we’ll respond promptly

map_card.title: Visit Our Office
map_card.subtitle: Come visit us at our Dubai headquarters for in-person consultations.

quick.subtitle: Fill out the form below and we’ll get back to you within 24 hours.

footer.default_office_address: Business Bay, Dubai, UAE Building XYZ, Office 123

login.subtitle: A brighter, cleaner space is just a click away. Log in to access your personalized cleaning services and manage your bookings.
login.card_subtitle: Sign in to your Bright Scope account

register.title: Create Your Account
register.subtitle: Join Bright Scope for a cleaner future
register.info_subtitle: A brighter, cleaner space is just a click away. Create your account to access premium cleaning services and eco-friendly solutions.

forgot.subtitle: Don't worry, it happens to the best of us. Enter your email address and we'll send you a verification code to reset your password.
forgot.step2: Check your email for verification code
forgot.step4: Log in with your new password
forgot.card_subtitle: No worries, we'll send you reset instructions
forgot.will_send_code_note: We will send a verification code to this address
forgot.security_note_body: For your security, the reset link will expire in 15 minutes. If you don't receive the email, check your spam folder.
